1.content:
Hobby detective stories with a tickling hobby side-focus...That's the concept really.

These stories would feature wannabe detective Summer Salt; her younger sister Mouse; and her best friends Jamie and Chris (whose genders the author is free to choose).

Any author is free to create or add to any stories.

For a more extended scope on the characters, consult the LEXICON.

Further guidance can be found on the below links.
1.title: Choose your own adventure

12.content:
Without going into much needless detail:
during their latest adventure (see The Clue at Cackle Creek, Summer fans!) four kids (cough 17-old-ish in this story) managed to get their hands on an amazing artifact.

It was called the Bewitchery Diamond, and it was a palm-sized gem that could change your story if you made a wish on it. Its limitations were unknown, but the children have successfully used it in the past to: change their genders, swap their bodies, grow to tiny or enormous sizes; (yep this thing is the ultimate fetish tool :p...)

However, this power came at a cost. First: you could never be certain exactly how the wish came true; some outcomes, as the children learned, could be quite horrific. Second, nobody not even the person using the diamond could be sure that they'd remember the change afterwards or notice that it has happened in the first place. These two conditions made the diamond very dangerous to use, and indeed the kids have agreed among themselves to never use it again except in the case of a serious emergency.

But that was then. And that adventure seemed to be quite a long way away, as the four sat in front of the fireplace, chatting on a cold winter evening.
With the world cold and dark outside, and the four huddled together in the company of warm cocoa, and -naturally- reminiscing about their previous adventures, the talk quickly turned to the diamond.

---
"Can you imagine what you could do with it?" Chris Clove daydreamed loudly. "I wouldn't have to be Ignored Chris anymore - I could be Chris Clove, the...school's superstar!"

"If I could use it I'd ask to grow up right now. Being the youngest sucks." Mouse Salt (whose parents introduced new curfew rules just the other day) commented.

"Nonono, you guys are thinking about it all wrong!" Summer, the level-headed one, interrupted. "We should do something important and useful, like...I don't know...Use it against one of the bad guys we've been fighting in the past."

"What'd you wish for, Jamie?" Chris asked their fourth, oddly silent friend.

"Oh! ...me? I don't know, I guess I never thought about it."

"It's not like you to be so boring" Chris joked.

But secretly all four were fantasizing about what they'd do with the diamond that night, and at one point, one of them could not stand it anymore and tiptoed back to the living room, took the diamond out of its hiding place and said the words...
12.title: It's a multiverse mix-up...

choices: Try to play the role of the Prince and learn more
I won't hurt anyone! I'll use this disguise to free everyone.
121.content:
Summer sneaked back in the living room; she knew she shouldn't be doing this after what happened last time with Jamie&Chris, but this was important. She knew that among all of her friends, she was the only one with a really good reason to use the diamond.

"I want to know where the Clown Prince is and what he is thinking...and I want to defeat him." She whispered.

Could the diamond fulfill this wish? It glowed and then...Summer disappeared...

---
When she opened her eyes, she felt sick. The eye height felt wrong, the air in the room too.
She seemed to be in some sort of engineering room, with scary metallic equipment and monitors.
But what made her jump back in shock was that there was a busy girl in a clown attire fiddling with a control panel right next to her.

"Is everything OK, Boss?" She asked her when she noticed Summer resting against a wall.
Boss...?

She looked down at her hands, which ended in red gloves. With a panic that almost made her throw up came the realization - she WAS in the body of the Clown Prince.

She stumbled and fell on the floor coughing while the clown girl rushed to her aid. Her mind wanted to wake up from this nightmare.

"I'm...OK..." She somehow got back on her feet.
"Oh, good! You wouldn't want to miss surveying the new captives in room 5."
Summer was feeling sickened again. While she was sitting at home, the Clown was continuing his old tricks behind her back...And this was just happening like it didn't matter.

She knew that she was not going to interrogate anyone if it was up to her, and she didn't quite feel strong enough yet to be ready to deal with whatever was waiting outside.
"No, right now I just need to...retire to my Evil Lair...I DO have an evil, lair, right?"
"Oh yes! 2nd door to the left.
It's too bad - we hoped you'd be giving us some new friends!"
She held up a device that looked like a half-sphere attached to a headband, or maybe a weird crown.
Summer's heart jumped. The mind control device! The Clown Prince stole it from Pao-Ting ages ago.

With this, she could put an end to - no maybe she might even be able to free the Clown Girls?
Pao-Ting once said it was irreversible but there were counterexamples and it wasn't like they ever got the chance to try it...

Part of her said that she should be working on undoing the spell, but the other part reminded that part that this was a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. Not just to learn the Clown's plans, but maybe even get access to all of his assets and destroy them forever, and free all of his captives.
121.title: Summer makes a wish

choices: The Clown Prince's happy school life begins!
He casually tickles Mouse (I always wanted a cute young sister!)
1211.content:
The Clown Prince woke up in a bed. That's odd, he thought, I haven't woken up in one of these since I was 15.
He got up and stared into a handheld mirror on the dressing table...

"YESS! My wish came true! SCHOOLGIRL!"
1211.title: (Meanwhile, the Prince...)

122.content:
Chris lifted up the diamond and said his most secret wish.

"I...wish I wasn't so unlucky anymore."
S/He considered this and added:
"Heck, a little popularity wouldn't hurt too."

The diamond started shaking, flared up brightly, then...


What was Chris' gender, by the way?
122.title: Chris makes a wish

choices: The guys are unable to control themselves and...
She is caught by the strongest boy
1222.content:
Chris Clove found herself lying in her bed.
That must've been the diamond's doing, which means the change must've had already taken place.
She jumped out of bed and to the mirror, and stared into it...

(Chris is a shy, short and petite girl. She's actually courageous and adventurous inside, but wishes her presence would get noticed more often, and that she had the strength to be able to speak up more.)

...and noticed nothing different. Same skinny legs, same cute but way too harmless-looking face, same powerless eyes.
She threw herself back on the bed in disappointment.

Maybe it was something else that changed. Maybe it was something she'd only notice once she was in that kind of situation. Tomorrow she...And while thinking that she already fell asleep.
------

When she walked to school, it was the family's dog that first showed signs of acting strange.
It growled and tried to bite her hand. So much for popularity, Chris thought.

Yet when he walked into school, she soon noticed that all the guys were eyeing her. She couldn't quite understand why.
One of the upperclassmen stepped to her.
"Hey babydoll." He pinched her sides. "Wanna come take a walk with me later?"
Chris jumped, and backed away with a flustered expression.

It wasn't the only person acting too "handsy" that day either.
Every boy she ran on the corridor seemed to try to get in a poke or pinch.
Chris wasn't sure what to think.
She liked being tickled, but the guys' forcefulness and attention scared her.

It all came into the finish when some of the guys sorrounded her behind the school during P.E.

"Hey Chris. You haven't been paying us much attention lately have you?"
1222.title: Girl Chris' unexpected popularity

125.content:
The girls didn't suspect that someone else was trying to steal the diamond, and was only waiting for them to fall asleep.
A person called...
125.title: Someone else breaks in...

choices: The kids manage to tie Margaret
She frees herself and flees to the kitchen
She frees herself and ties THEM instead
1251.content:
"Finally those idiots have fallen asleep" Margaret said to herself. She walked in.
Normally she wouldn't care much for what Summer was doing, but she heard that apparently that dork got her hands on some amazing find. If she had something this great just lying around, she would be taking it for herself, thank you very much.
With that diamond, she could undo all her humiliating history with Summer. Rather than being in a life debt to some bookworm, she could have her self-respect back and be free, just like it was before.

"Hmm but what should I wish for...I know! I want an universe where I'm the better of Summer in every way. And whenever we meet, I'm the one in charge."

The diamond glowed...
---
"Bye kids! Obey your babysitter!"
Eh? Who were these talking to? Were these Summer's parents? And why was she still in Summer's house?

The Salt parents waved goodbye and Margaret turned around and oh god this was all kinds of wrong.

The Jamie, Chris and Summer that ran into the room were the same she remembered save for one thing, they were all the wrong age. They looked about the same age as that annoying sister of Summer's - who, she now noticed, dozed harmlessly on the bed some way away, having de-aged just as much as her sister.

"I did not wish for this! Summer, were you the one who set this up?"
The kid who looked like Summer stick a tongue at her.
Oh what am I doing, I'm expecting answers from a kid, M. thought.

That diamond! It had to be still here, she only had to find it again.

"Leave me alone! Damn, I hate kids."

One of them managed to trip her.
"Aw yeah! We got her! Get her feet!"
"Get off you little brats."
1251.title: Margaret the diamond thief

choices: "No, please I want this to end!"
12511.content:
"NOT THE FEET!" she yelled out in desperation
Chris ran an extended middle finger on her sole playfully,
while Jamie grabbed and inspected the right one.

"What-the-fff-are-you-doing, you lil' brats!" she screamed.

"Hee-hee, you're the most ticklish baby sitter we've ever had."

Summer managed to get on her back in the meantime, pinning her down.
Margaret was wearing short leggings and shivered in fright for all the skin that was left bare.
After she got free for a moment, she had to put those feet back in some boots or something, she decided.

But Chris' finger was soo distracting, she just wanted to bang her head into the floor and giggle.
12511.title: The kids manage to tie down Margaret

choices: She tickles Young Summer with cruel tools.
She tickles Jamie's and Chris' feet too.
125112.content:
"What is it,you don't like you're having fun?"
"I don't! When I used your stupid diamond to turn you into kids, ahahaha, I didn't expect you to be like this!"

"What do you think, should we let our captive go, could she be telling the truth?" Jamie asked.
Summer thought about this. "Okay."

As soon as she got off, Margaret jumped to her feet and grabbed her arm.
"A-HA! Now I got you, brats!
And you too, don't go anywhere if you want to save your friend." she warned the other two who huddled on the floor in fright.

Retrieving some jump-ropes from the other rooms, she tied up the three kids' hands and feet neatly, and brought some hankies for use as makeshift gags.
She sat them all down in a line on the sofa.

"NOW I'll take revenge for my tickled feet."
She winked at Summer.
"Don't worry, I don't want to kill you Salt...Only a little."

She scribbled her fingers all over little Summer's feet who went crazy with mirthful laughter. She was never really tickled seriously before. (Of course, with Mouse's birth, that would change in a few years. :p)

"This is great, this is wonderful, I love this." Margaret sung.
125112.title: Somehow she wriggles free.

125113.content:
Margaret cried out in desperation, and suddenly she felt a warm glow and was back on the Salt's floor next to the fireplace, panting. The diamond lay on the floor next to her.

Oh. She took it in her hand again. So it worked that way too. Good to know, she thought.
Well then...time to run for it.

But she hesitated.
Now she was out of immediate peril,
somehow she was regretting it that she interrupted it so soon.

Even if she was at the fingertips of her old enemy, it gave her quite a thrill to be able to berate and order younger Summer around all she wanted and she'd have to listen to it.
Even when she was tied down she was in charge, right?
Even if she could fight back and win, in the end she'd have no choice but to listen to her...

---
"Hee, we didn't expect you to come back."
"Yeah, not many of our babysitters let us do this to them."

Margaret, tied up and gagged, struggled happily on the floor while the kids were passing around the tooth-and paintbrushes she brought in with interest.

"Mmmmh" Margaret said happily.
---

Later on, in the morning, the Summer gang found an exhausted and blushing Margaret sleeping on the floor downstairs.

"Just leave her alone." Summer ordered. "That girl's always been weird."
125113.title: "No, please I want this to end!"

choices: "The claw" gets the better of Summer
Turns out it's a pretty equal fight
12512.content:
Margaret retreated to the kitchen.
"God" she panted. "Who knew that three tiny brats could be such a handful!"
She could hear them shouting and since the kitchen had two entrances she decides that she should retreat to a better position. She quickly went upstairs and noticed an open room.

Upon enter, she realized that it was none other than Summer's father's study.
Her scheming side emerged again.
This room looked rich with information. Definitely some good information she could use to blackmail Summer later here. Let's see what Mr. Salt is hiding.

She sat back on the chair like a queen, and picked up a dossier at random, but barely started reading when she noticed that somebody stood at the door. It was young Summer, comically still cradling the arm of a toy rabbit.

"What do you want? Shoo."
"You shouldn't be looking at Dad's books."
"Yeah, and what are you gonna do about it?"

She walked up to her and flicked her forehead.
Heh, maybe there was something fun about this situation after all.
"I know you're too stupid to understand. But I'm bigger and stronger than you now. So why don't you just run and..."

Summer charged at her with a battlecry. With a surprised "ooph", both older girl and younger girl ended up on the floor in a tickle fight.
12512.title: She frees herself and flees to dad's room

choices: Time for Pao to live through this "service"
1252.content:
Of course, the only place where the diamond could be expected to end up was in the hands of a genius, Pao thought.
Summer was too short-sighted to keep it hidden away in her drawer. The right person could do wonders with this...Of course, there was no harm in making a tiny wish for herself first.

"I want to be acknowledged! Praised, and famous! I know! I'll wish for the whole town to grovel and groan at my feet. Hahaha, I'm so clever."

The diamond flared up, the town disappeared and...

Pao-Ting was sitting on the top of some sort of Aztec pyramid. What was this? Where'd the town go?
She realized that her feet were locked in big stone stocks and thought, this can't be good. She noticed that there was a long, LONG line of people in front of her, stretching beyond and around the bottom of the pyramid.

The first person in line crouched down and kissed her feet.

"I got it! That diamond must've been a trap by that stupid Summer. Just you wait when I get out of this..."

"All hail to the feet of the goddess! Its touch will bring us good luck!" The person to the left chanted.
Pao realized in horror that after the previous person stepped aside, the next one knelt down to her feet, and ran a finger up and down.
"Hey! Ha-ha, no touchy! Hey! I'm your goddess, right? Then I command you..."
The man on the left stepped closer, he looked like a sort of priest.
"Please, goddess, the people must get in touch with your feet or bad luck will haunt them."
"They don't need to tickle me for that!"
"Ah, but you see it's very important...For the goddess' foot and voice to respond, some of these people have a lot of troubles to confess..."
"That's got nothing to do with me! How long does this line go on for anyway?"
"It's a sixteen hour service every day. In the dry season, then we go back to foothbaths. That's about three months from now..."
1252.title: Pao-Ting's footocracy

choices: Nobody is allowed to tickle Pao-Ting's perfect toes!
131.content:
(aka The No-Deal Ordeal, The Itch to Scratch, the Ex-Goon's Agony Anguish, the Bound Bliss Brouhaha, the Captured Cutie Coochie Coo Caper, the Formula of the Fidgeting Feet , the Giggling Genius' Gagged Glee, the Hopeless Helpless Heel Hilarity, the Tale of the Tormented Toe Trick)

(aka where did Pao-Ting spend adventure 3)

Pao-Ting was captured by two spies.
"Why have we brought her here?" the one named Bernard said, adjusting the stocks they had put Pao in.
"That looks like Dr. Ling's little girl." her partner, a woman named Victoria said "If anyone, she'll know where he had fled to."
"What? My father's gone? Nobody had told me about this!"

"We'll see. Tell us girl, are your soles VERY ticklish?"
131.title: A Stroked Genius

choices: Seek out a certain kid detective & sister for help
Find a kindly old lady or a dog
Talk to some scary men in an attempt to get hired
133.content:
Once upon a time there was a girl clown, whose only task was to serve the Boss Clown.
It was a day job that was uncomplicated yet fulfilling, full of fun games and laughter every day.
Smiley (for that was the name her Boss gave to this particular clown girl) never doubted the satisfaction of that daily life, that is until...

Until one day, she and the other girls encountered a teenager and her friends who did not want to laugh and didn't know how to be happy at all! It was only natural that they would help them out, as their Boss said so too. But the way the girls would keep resisting their efforts and fought back left a strong impression on Smiley, and even more importantly, she was missing the kid detective's sister, who she felt she had developed a strong sense of camaraderie with.
And although they only had met briefly, Smiley secretly started to wish to see her again...

And so during the last big move that transported all the girls and equipment from the Mansion to a new location, Smiley got "lost", or more precisely, she lost herself.

---

Wandering the streets, the eternal clown...

The outdoors turned out to be strange. There were people walking about (sometimes bumping into her) who did not laugh or appear to try to be happy at all.
Smiley squinted and examined her reflection in a shop window. Her makeup was slightly askew, but it was still her. She honked her nose twice to make sure.

The Chinese-looking girl who sometimes would be brought to the Mansion said it once that the clown girls were "kidnapped" or "brainwashed" but she wasn't sure if she could believe her, after all as far as she could recall, Smiley had always been just...Smiley. Although she wasn't feeling quite sure if that was true right now.

Without her morning, lunch and afternoon tickling, she was feeling strange right now. Her body still craved it, but walking up to a stranger and asking them to tickle her did not seem like a terribly good idea.

She had made a sign on a piece of cardboard that said WILL WORK 4 GIGGLES. but so far it did not work. No-one wanted to hire someone for giggles, which was strange because as far as Smiley remembered, that was the only thing you got hired for.

Being a clown girl in the big town, whose only skill was to make people laugh with a touch. Poor, lost Smiley, what is she gonna do?
133.title: Clown Girl begins

1331.content:
Mouse was lying on her bed when she heard the first pebble knock on her window. She quickly hid under her pillow a magazine that, if found, would've made Mrs. Salt quite concerned about her daughter's developing interests.

She threw the hinges open and squinted into the darkness.
"Psst. Over here."
Mouse's eyes fell on a frightened yet hopeful face, dimly lit, covered in white paint and sweat.

Although her older sister would vehemently deny that Mouse could possibly share any of her natural detective instinct, the younger Salt sister actually possessed a latent set of natural detective gifts of her own.
For one thing: she had an AMAZING memory for faces.
"Smiley?"

"Mouse! I ran from him! I'm free! Now he can't tell me what to do, we can tickle each other whenever we want..."
"Psst! Quick, get in here!"

Mouse was spinning on a revolving chair, trying to assess this new situation.

"So...He doesn't know that you are here...That's good..."

Smiley nodded, hopefully.
"First things first. What'll need to do right now is to..."
1331.title: Seek out a certain kid detective & sister for help

choices: Teach her to fend for herself?
Something INGENIOUS I just thought of, Summer style.
13311.content:
Some days later, as Summer passed Mouse's room she heard laughter from inside. She knocked.
"Mouse, are you experimenting with self-tickling again? You KNOW what Mom said about tying yourself up unsupervised..."

Since there was no answer, she decided to try something. She took out her hairpin, which was a cleverly disguised lockpick. (It caused her no end of trouble, both making it and keeping it in her hair, but it felt cool, the kind of thing a junior sleuth should be expected to have.) Mouse's lock, hardly a major challenge, gave with only a gentle push.

Summer was shocked at what she saw. There she was, Mouse, all bound in a straitjacket, and a clown girl tickling her feet.
"Wait!!!" Mouse cried out in a hurry before Summer could open her mouth to scream for help. "It's okay! I asked her to do it!"

Ten minutes later, all three of them were sitting on the living room floor.

"Mouse, this isn't like keeping a dog or something! You are so irresponsible!"

"But I got her food and made her a place under my bed! And I let her tickle me every day! Well. More than once every day."
"Every...How long exactly has this been going on?"
"Oh, 3 or 4 days."
Summer facepalmed.
"Mouse, you can't have a live-in tickler. You have to be like, er, I guess some adults may do that..."
"I don't mind being Smiley's captive." Mouse said and blushed.
"Okay wow I'm going to ignore that because I'm 100% sure you're way too young for that comment.
Anyway, she can't stay here. You have to let her be free and frolic in the wild with her family etcetera..."
"Summer's she's not a wild animal."
"She still has to leave."
"But she hasn't got anyone! C'mon Summer, we can't kick her out!
We have to help the poor girl somehow."

"Let me think. How about we..."
13311.title: Hide her in Mouse's room.

choices: Smiley DOES go on a tickle-rampage (and the house if full of victims)
Summer manages to unleash her outside instead
They find a way to calm her for now (but they'll need to find an outlet soon)
13312.content:
Summer was listening to the story with her mouth agape. A clown girl rejecting the influence of the Clown Prince by her own will, what a find! If they can ever find Pao-Ting, this is going to make her head pop!

"For now, we'll hide her in MY room. I don't trust you around her, Mouse." The little sister looked disappointed and offended.
Don't worry, I'll smuggle in food and give her plenty to read."
"Are you sure that's what she needs, because it looks to me she isn't quite sane yet..."
"Don't worry, I know what I'm doing." Summer said with confidence.

Two days later...

Smiley was sitting on the floor, chewing her nails. Her eyes looked like they were about to pop out.

"I don't understand. She was so well-behaved at first, but now she's constantly mumbling about tickling."
Summer said as the girl's fingers twitched around in familiar motions.
"I think you starved her out too much. She'll go on a tickle-rampage any moment."
13312.title: Tell Summer.

133123.content:
Summer and mouse were pondering what they could do to calm her down.

Meanwhile, poor smiley's mutters were getting louder and she was becoming more tickle-hungry by the second.

Mouse looked at her sister concerned. "What are we gonna do? Look at her, she's losing it".

Summer looked at the poor fidgeting clown girl. "Yea, I know, but what are we supposed to do? Let her go on a rampage? She won't stop."

Mouse then looked at her: "Well, I have at least one idea".

"What is it? Come on, she's completely freaking out".

"Well, We could just tickle her" Mouse said.

Summer looked at mouse like she had 3 heads. But just as she was about to say something, smiley seemed to have heard and she grew excited.

"You girls would tickle me. YES, PLEASE DO I-"

Summer quickly slapped her hand over the excited clown's mouth.

"Quiet down. Mouse, where's mom?

"She went to the store for a few things. She won't be back for a while though"

Summer made sure the door and windows were closed. They didn't want any unwanted attention. She then flinched in surprise as she heard laughter coming from -
133123.title: They find a way to calm her for now (but they...

1331232.content:
Hahahahahahahahahahahaha yehehehehehehehes fihihihihnallly hahahahahahahahahahahahahaha Smiley was fully laughing as mouse tickled her belly and ribs.

"Mouse, you scared me. At least warn me next time"Summer said annoyed.

"Sorry, I wasn't aware you weren't paying attention." Mouse said sheepishly never stopping her tickling on the hysterical clown.

"Are you completely sure this is the only way to keep her calm"? Summer asked.

"Well, Probably not but I couldn't think of anything else on the fly. Besides, look at her." Mouse said.

Summer obliged and she had to admit, smiley was looking a lot calmer despite her hysterical laughter. She wasn't muttering to herself anymore and somehow she could tell that smile on her face was genuine. She looked actually kinda innocent.

Summer left the laughter filled room to think of something.
1331232.title: Smiley's medicine

13313.content:
"Mom! Mouse! Has my copy of "Knots and the Modern Detective" arrived yet?" Summer Salt shouted as she was coming down the stairs for breakfast.

"Summer Salt, come into the kitchen, we need to introduce you to someone!" was her mother's reply that came.

Sitting around the table were her mother, Mouse and...
"Hullo" Smiley said with a full mouth. Summer did the kind of backflip that she got her name after.

"That's a Clown Girl! Probably sent by the Clown Prince to infiltrate our home!"
"No!" Mouse protested. "She's my friend!"
"She tickled you to half to death in the Mansion!"
"Well...Yeah, but she didn't mean to."
"You and I are going to talk about this "mansion" and staying out after curfew later." her mother warned.
"Right now though, I want you to escort this girl and help her on her first school day."
"This...THING is going to come to school with us?"
"Don't call her that!" Mouse snapped.
"Oh yes, all the paperwork is already arranged. It is not right for a girl of your age to wander outside and miss out on her education."

Summer nodded. It was perfectly normal that Hollering High & Elementary would admit a new student with no means of identification and a likely history of insanity in the middle of the school year.
It is how fictional schools operate everywhere.

"Look, er...Smiley, right?" Summer asked doubtfully as they were walking to school later. "I doubt it's a good idea to start with listening to the teacher's lessons first." Either she'll say something embarassing or fall asleep, she concluded. "What we need to do first is to reintegrate you into society."
"Reintel-what?" Mouse asked. Whatever it was, it sounded painful.
"Reintegrate." Summer repeated mercilessly.

"We have to have you talk to people, to get a feel of how things are done out here."

"But who should we try it out on, hmm..."
13313.title: Schoolmates!

choices: They don't, their the next targets
134.content:
After Summer and the gang took down the clown prince, two rouge clown girls slipped away plotting something. Over the next two weeks, girls ranging from summer's age to 18 have been kidnapped by unknown sources and were never seen again. Police still investigate the incidents but keep coming up with nothing but swear they kept hearing laughter.

One night, another girl no more then 15 was out walking home from her friend's house when she heard something in the bushes. It sounded like giggling, female giggling. Feeling nervous, she walked faster but was instantly tackled to the ground and was reduced to a laughing mess by the assailants. They were two girls with slightly ripped clothes, wearing smiling masks. What stuck out to the laughing girl were unknown devices that stuck to their bodies. She was surprised to hear the devices vibrating, which must've been tickling them like mad but they seemed to take it in stride. Giggling almost insanely, they talked to each other and agreed to take her. "HAHAHAHAHAAHAHA PLEHEHEHEHEHEASE STAHAHAHAHAP. IT'S TOHOHOHOTURE HAHAHAHA" The poor girl couldn't muster the strength to fight back as she laughed herself to tears. One of the girls looked at her, giggles intertwined with her words.

"Hehe dohhon't wohohry, hehehe sohohon ihihit wohohon't behehehe. Ihihihn facy hahaha yohohu'll lohohove ihihit" The hysterical masked girl said. They then dragged the laughing girl off the road. The three girls laughter filling the night sky. It didn't take long for this odd story to reach a certain pre-teen detective and her younger sister.

Where did they find the hideout?
134.title: Summer Salt vs the Tickle Gang

1342.content:
Summer and mouse decided to start their investigation in the city. After hours of trying to find anything suspicious, they suddenly heard clattering in an alley. They move quickly but quietly and stuck their heads, almost in unison around the corner and saw a girl in tattered clothes, enter an old building. Giving each other a curious look, they snuck towards the door and caught it just as it nearly closed. The building was completely run down, spider webs in corners, old furniture that has seen better days.

"How could she just disappear like that?" Mouse whispered to summer. The girl in question shrugged before suddenly shushing mouse as she heard something under her. Putting her ear to the dusty old floor, she could barely make out the sound of...laughing? "What's going on down there?" Summer asked herself. As she got up, she noticed a trap door just barely open. The two sisters opened the door as quietly as they could and saw-
1342.title: Abandoned Building

13421.content:
Summer and mouse looked inside with widened eyes. "Summer, isn't tha-" Mouse was cut off by her older sister who was looking on with dread. They saw the girl from the news who was kidnapped a few days ago. The teen girl was tied standing up against a pole laughing hysterically as two masked girls were torturing her sides and armpits.

Other girls wearing identical masks were watching and giggling hysterically due to th devices on their bodies. What she was screaming out through her hysterics shocked them the most. "HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA MOHOHOHOHOHOHORE HAHAHAHAHA TIHIHIHKCLE ME MOHOHOHOHOHRE HAHAHAHAHAHAHHA YOU WERE RIGHT. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA I LOHOHOHOVE THHIHIHIHIS" The masked girls cheered through their laughter as they converted another girl into one of them. The sisters watched in shocked silence as the girl they were tracking down just gave herself up to them. Suddenly, they saw someone else arrive.

She wasn't wearing a mask like the others. She had messy red hair, just barely pass her shoulders. She had a simple tank top and short-shorts, ripped slightly. She wasn't wearing any footwear at all and unlike the girls who were only giggling, she was laughing out loud. The devices on her bodies were set to max, causing the red head to laugh herself to tears, yet she handled it like a champ, walking with complete ease."Hahahahahaha sohohoho hahahahahaha yohohou ohoohur nehehehw gihihihiirl hahahahahaha wehehehelcome". The red head girl said, laughs intertwined with every word. The girl was released from the pole, a tickle-induced grin stuck on her face and she was taken to another room. The others soon left as well, giggling filling the halls of the lair. After they left, the sisters decided to-
13421.title: The girl the gang kidnapped

134212.content:
The two teen detectives decided to save retreating as a last resort and decided to investigate. After ripping their clothes slightly and finding spare masks(what luck), they entered the hideout. Taking cover in a nearby broom closet, hoping the other members wouldn't come in at the moment, the two decided to split up. "I'll find that girl. They must've really put her through torture for her to say that." mouse said. "In that case, i'll investigate that red head. She might be the leader of this group". Summer said. As soon as they were sure the coast was clear the two slipped and went of to investigate.

Who are we following?
134212.title: Investigate anyway

1342122.content:
Summer walked through the hideout, fake giggling the whole way as she passed other masked members of the gang. Thankfully, they didn't notice she wasn't wearing the devices they were. After multiple twist and turns, she still hadn't found her. "Gee, this place is huge. Where can I find he-" She was cut off from her thoughts as she heard loud laughter coming from the next room. The door was partially cracked open so she was able to sneak a peek at what was happening."HAHAHAHHAHAHAHA MORE MORE HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHHA" Summer nearly face faulted at what she was seeing.

The red headed girl was sitting a chair, her arms tied to the armrest, laughing hysterically as another girl with messy blond hair tortured her ribs. The devices on her were torturing her armpits, belly and sides were vibrating loud enough for summer to hear from the door. She laughed herself to tears and yet she looked like she was on top of the world. Soon the blonde spoke up, giggling as well. "Come on Fionna, you have to tell the others about the new targets we're after." She said. "So that's her name. And what does she mean new targets?" Summer thought slightly scared. "HAHAHAHAHAHA FIHIHIHIHIHIHINE SAHAHAHARAH FIHIHIHIHNE HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" "And sarah is the blonde. She must be her second in command." Summer thought. She knew the red head may be the leader but she didn't expect to find her right hand already. "I need to infiltrate that meeting. I have to know who they're after." Summer thought.
1342122.title: Summer's path

13421221.content:
It took a while and some decent acting but she manage to infiltrate the meeting. The meeting room with filed to the brim with gang members, their giggles and occasional laughing fits filling the room. Suddenly, the door opened and two more giggle and laughing fits filled the room. "I swear, all this laughing is gonna get stuck in my head" Summer thought. Fionna and sarah, the two leaders of the gang came and stood in front of everyone. The members in question tried to stifle their giggling fits, although very few succeeded. Fionna then spoke up through her laughter. "HAHAHA I glad you HAHAHAHA sorry *snort* all made ihihihihiht. We hahahve found new tahahargets for our lihihihtle fahamily of ours." Fionna said, trying to talk clearly. "You'd be easier to understand if you turn those things off." Summer thought slightly annoyed. Sarah got and displayed pictures of their newest targets. Summer's eyes widened in horror behind the mask as she saw herself and mouse were her next targets.

The masked members cheered and laughed as they saw the two girls. Summer quickly played along with their excitement, hiding her fear. Fionna then spoke up. "Thahahts right. Summer and susan salt. PFFT HAHAHAHA Sorry haha, these two detectives have had a lot of laughs on their adventures, i'm sure they wouldn't mind sharing them with us. We move out in 2 days girls. HAHAHAHAHA Who are we girls?" THE LAUGHTER LOVERS. Summer had a "really" look on her face. "That's the name. Seriously" She thought. After the cheers and speech subsided, the girl let the meeting room and went out into the lair. "Summer blended in with the girls until she was able to find a hiding spot in a nearby closet. "This isn't good. Even if we escape, we're next. I have to find mouse and we need to stop them, NOW." Summer thought.
13421221.title: Summer's shock

13421222.content:
Summer went stiff as the door opened more then expected and the two girls looked at the masked detective and were instantly onto her. "Nihihihice try hehehehe but we dohohon't have ahahany memhehhembers your ahahahage." Sarah said though giggles. Summer was shocked, they were onto her already. They probably noticed the lack of devices on her body. "HAHAHAHAHA COME ON IHIHIHN HHEH SUUHUHUHUMER" Fionna belted out. The detective's eyes widened, they knew it was her. With no other choice, she went in and closed the door behind her. "I'm aware of your little group.

You've been kidnapping girls from around the city and brainwashing them into your little slaves. This stop now" Summer said. The two other girls looked at each other and laughed, in amusement for once. "HAHAHA Why would wehehe hahahahahaha let them go. They lohohohve it hehehere. *Snort* HAHAHAHAHAHA" Fionna barely got out through laughing fits. Sarah took over since fionna was laughing too hard to continue. "Hehe These girls mahahay hahahave been hehehe involuntary taken hehere buhuhut now thehehy're ahahahctually hahahhappy." Sarah got out through giggling fits.

Summer tried to think about what they were saying and how they were possibly ok with this. "Still, capturing anymore girls, I can't let you." Summer said before the door flew open and two taller girls came in and grabbed summer's arms. Turns out sarah had called for security while she was talking. "Hey, let me go" Summer said trying to pull her arms free to no avail. "HAHAHAHA TAKE HEHEHER TO MY ROHOHOHOHOM HAHAHAHAHA. I'LL HAHAHAH TALK WITH HEHEHEHER LAHAHHATER HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" Fionna ordered laughing hysterically. With that summer was dragged of to the leader's room. She still didn't give up. "Since it'll just be us and hopefully no backup, maybe I can get her to tell me the plan." Summer thought. Hopefully mouse is doing better.
13421222.title: Summer... Busted?

134212221.content:
Meanwhile, mouse was doing her own search. Doing a pretty decent acting job, she managed to traverse through the lair with little difficulty. “So many rooms, where could she be?” Mouse thought to herself. She then heard laughter coming from down the hall. Peeking through the crack, she saw the girl she was looking for along with two other masked members.

The girl in question was being held in a full nelson by one girl while the other tickled her belly without mercy. “I think you found her weak spot” one of them teased As the girls laughter seemed to get louder. Mouse was half tempted to cover her ears from the volume. The captured girl laughed hysterically but it seems she wasn’t lying back when the sisters first arrived.

She was being tickled mercilessly but she seemed to be genuinely enjoying herself. Her laughter wasn’t entirely forced. It sounded happy rather then tortured. Mouse racked her brain trying to think of a way to get to her. Soon-
134212221.title: Mouse's search

choices: Talk to her, Give mouse more time
134212222.content:
Summer was waiting in fionna's private room. She looked around and saw a simple bead and closet, but it was another door marked "For private use" that had her both curious and somewhat disturbed. Soon the door swung open and a still laughing fionna came in and had a seat on the couch in front of her. "You wanted to talk?" Summer asked knowing the answer. "HAHAHAHA whehel *snort* of course hahahaha bahahahaha" Fionna answered laughing. Summer was starting to get annoyed by all the constant laughing. "Will you at least take those things off? I can barely understand you." summer said clearly annoyed. "HAHA I can't. These are stuck like this." Fionna said. Summer's eyes widened. They were like this all the time. How has she not passed out or gotten even slightly tired?

How did she sleep or eat knowing she was being tickled 24/7? Fionna could almost read her mind. "I hehe guess hahahahhaah HAHAHa I mahahay as well explain". She then stifled her laughter as best as she could, tho she couldn't stop grinning even if she tried. "A few months, sarah and I visited a good friend of ours ,Mary, who had made quite the invention. She said these were suppose to be for massages but she messed with us and stuck them on us. The moment she turned them on, me and sarah were turned into laughing idiots." Fionna then paused to let out a small giggling fit. "Both of us were already really ticklish so this was too much to handle. She even put them on our tickle spots, knowing we couldn't take it. Sarah and I finally couldn't take much more and tried ripping them off.

Seeing how they wouldn't we tried pounding at them instead but it only made things worse. We ended up turning them to their max setting and nothing she could do could stop it" She had to stop again to let herself laugh. "We both laughed to the point we passed out. We woke up in the hospital and we could barely talk from laughing so hard. It took a whole day to eventually get used to it and by that time, we didn't want the doctor to get them off us." Summer gasped at her words. "We both learned we loved being tickled nonstop. I'd never seen sarah laugh like that before and she looked so happy. I couldn't believe how much I was loving it. I decided from then on that others needed to know this. As you can see, multiple girls here learned that they loved it too". Summer didn't need her to finish. "That's when she started kidnapping others". Summer thought. The girl was a masochist for this kind of thing. She'd probably get a job with the clown prince easily. Summer knew she needed to be stopped but how. They were alone but she didn't know what tricks she had up her sleeve. What should she do?
134212222.title: Fionna's story

1342122221.content:
Summer lunged for fionna, determined to end this. What surprised her was that despite her hysterical laughter, fionna moved as if summer was in slow motion. Summer eyes widened as fionna appeared behind her in an instant. Fionna managed an evil grin through her laughing fits and tickled summer's sides and belly. "PFFT HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA STO-HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA-PLE-HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAAHAHA" Summer eyes were glued shut and she couldn't help but double over laughing. That fact that fionna was laughing nonstop as well made it harder to control herself.

Her fingers glided over summer's midsection, tickling her like mad. She couldn't get any words out no matter how hard she tried. Summer finally got an opening when fionna let out a huge laughing fit when one of her more sensitive spots were tickled by the devices and summer slipped out of her grasp, gasping for breath. "Holy crap. That tickled like mad. H-how did she-" Summer was in a slight state of shock. She was nearly defeated in an instant. She knew she needed another plan, she couldn't beat her head on. As fionna finally calmed down as much as she could, she playfully smiled at summer. "Hahaha cohohome on, hahahaha, this is getting fun." Fionna taunted. Now what?
1342122221.title: Summer goes for it

13421222211.content:
As summer was thinking of a plan, mouse had burst through the door and sarah the second in command was right on her heels. 'Hehehehehe you're prehehetty fast kid, hahaha but now whahahat are you gonna dohohho?" sarah taunted, giggling the whole time. "Sorry sis, she found me out just as I was getting close to finding that girl they took in." Mouse said sadly.

Summer groaned in frustration as now they're cover was blown. "We need a plan. We can't beat them at their own game. The red head nearly took me out in second and blondie over their is likely the same. I want to see if they'll were out soon but if they're like this 24/7 and they're still able to move this well, then that's out the window." Summer thought. Summer looked around the room, desperate for anything that may give them an advantage, even a small one. She saw that the door was wide open and none of the others girls showed up but the leaders were way faster. Mouse then whispered to summer. "Maybe two on one? They can take one of us but not both. And I don't think their as tough as they look." Summer saw her point. If fionna hadn't stopped to let out that laughing fit, summer would've passed out from laughing so hard.

Those devices are tickling them all the time. Looks even they can't take it that much. Summer decided to go with mouse's ambush plan but first they needed to get out of the room. Summer then saw a smoke bomb next to her. "Smoke bombs? Probably for emergency escapes when the cops are closing in. They could work." summer thought. With that in mind, summer picked up the bomb and threw it towards the laughing leaders and it went off, blinding them. The sisters quickly ran out of the room and found a nearby closet to hide in. "That should buy us some time. Mouse, we're going with your plan but who should we take down first." summer asked. Mouse thought for a second before choosing-
13421222211.title: Someone burst through the door

choices: Speak of the devil(Sarah passes by their hiding place and she's alone)
134212222112.content: The two decided to go after sarah. "If we can get her to talk about fionna, we should be able to make ending this easier." Mouse said. Summer nodded and patted her sister's head in pride. "Now, how to do that?" Summer thought to herself. "With those devices on her, she's lost the element of surprise. But she's way faster then either of us. And her skill may be on par with her leader as well. An ambush may be the only way and and will only work if she can't call for any guards." Summer thought. Just as she was about to walk mouse through her plan-
134212222112.title: Sarah-She may know something

14.content:
Here be stories that are part of the canon but do not merit a full length interactive of their own.

These are stories that are either exactly one page, or only 2-3 extra branches long. Feel free to add as many more as your own as you like.
14.title: Short stories

142.content:
My name is Dan Mitchels, and you may have trouble believing me on this, so please just trust me and listen when I say:

I think I might be the protagonist of a tickle fetish story.

Some may call this great, except..
I don't actually have a tickle fetish. So this does not make me happy at all!

Yet for reasons I do not understand, fate constantly goes out of its way to service me. Every minute, every day of the week.

Take the following example.
I'm just walking to my classes as normal, proceeding along the school's main corridor.
There are some girls running about in front of me, pushing each other, shouting and laughing - like girls do, right?

But the suddenly the following happens:
One of the girls cries out:
"What did you say about my hair?"
She puts her manicured nails on her friend's sides, and the two fall on the floor. I can clearly see their panties as they drop.
The first girl then begins to squeeze the second one's sides, until the second girl goes into a counterattack, and slips her friend's stockinged feet out of those shoes, and runs her ten fingers over her soles, causing the first to double over and the first ger the upper hand.

I mean, here I am, with this amazingly incredible scenario of tickle-play happening right in front of my eyes.
And yet I feel nothing! It doesn't excite me the slightest!
I wish these two bitches would just get out of the way!

And then a teacher comes up and I can hardly believe my ears when she says:
"Sue! Sally! That's quite enough, meet me for detention after school! And since you like being tickled so much, maybe we'll make THAT the subject of your detention!"

I mean, can you even picture it? A teacher saying that? Wouldn't they have to face molestation charges or something?
But apparently not. I know; I looked it up. And the librarian looked at me like I was being weird!

So here I am, every day, living like this.
I watch these happy perverts frolic around me and secretly in the back of my mind, I despise them.
But I can't do anything about it. Fate dealt me a card from the bottom of the deck, and made me the one with the odd tastes. Oh how I wish I could meet just one girl who shares my fantasies but they never do!

It's maddening and unfair.
I mean look at me - I've got good looks - dark hair, brown eyes and a brooding attitude that chicks supposedly go crazy after. And they do, yes - at first. The problem is that as soon as they're starting to get to know me, they always, ALWAYS ask for me to tickle them! And when they find out it doesn't excite me, then they just leave!

I went out with this one girl once. Serafine Kawasaki. Picked her out of the class specifically because she seemed shy and quiet - the kind of girl you picture being as far from anything weird as it can be.
I thought that maybe with effort she could be molded into the ideal girlfriend.

And yet picture this. We're in her room, I'm outting my hand on her breast - and she walks to a cupboard and starts taking out some amazing assortment of tickling tools! Furry handcuffs, ostrich feathers, soft brushes...I thought I'd have a heart attack right there! So naturally I refuse her, and now she's telling everyone
that Dan Mitchels is just "no good". I get so frustrated I could burst!

So I have learned my lesson.
No more passes, no more second chances.
I'll just live my life without interruptions in this hell, day to day...

Wait...What is that?
I hear a loud voice and suddenly I have my eyes on the most adorable freshman ever.

"Margaret! Leave those freshmen alone!"
The girl...Salt, was it?...says to her:
"I had told you before! The way you're doing it, tickling is NOT fun!

I stare in amazement. Could she be...?

Wait! Don't let your guard down! It always starts out like this!
Sure, she seems sweet and innocent now, but as soon as you get to know her, she's actually probably a total tickle masochist freak!

The other girl girl (Margaret) is now tickling her (of course).
Since the other girl offers no resistance, only defends herself (odd, very odd) she seems to get bored after a few minutes and stands up. Seems like she doesn't want to get in trouble with the teacher.
"Pff, you were just lucky this time Salt."

I'm staring at this girl sitting on the floor in front of me coughing and panting.
She looks up at me. My brain catches up too late that she was probably waiting for me to help her up.

"Thank you." She's says pouting a little.
"Wait...You were actually not having fun?"
She looks at me. "Did it LOOK LIKE I was?"

In a moment of weakness, I feel like I need to seize this chance. "Hey...I have these tickets for Friday, would you maybe like to...?"

I wait in front of the cinema. It's an hour late, I'm convinced now that she set me up and doesn't come.
Wait! There she...No, it's not her.
She dresses a bit like her, but it's a kid about half her size.

I'm not a lolicon so I don't really care.
However then she starts following me.
"What do you want, brat?"
"Brat yourself. I came to give you a message. Summer sent me."
Summer. Even her name is adorable.
"Where is she?"
"She caught a cold and couldn't come." She snorts and doesn't move.

"Er, would you like to...?"

We're having an ice cream afterwards.
She seems like a nice kid. Though being me means I had already noticed that "glint" in her eye.
Oh well, it's not her tastes I'm interested in.
I decide this is a good opportunity to carefully confirm a few things.

"Say, does your sister get tickled at home?"
"Oh yes. All the time."
"...What?"
"Sometimes my mom tickles her, sometimes I do...Sometimes we both tickle her at the same time!"
"And...she doesn't object?"
Mouse thought about this. "Not really as far as I know. I mean, she always curses when I do it, but she usually hugs me and calls me a good sister afterwards."
"I...See..." pause "Hey, could you pass on a message to her..?"

"Hey."
"Hey. I'm sorry I couldn't come last time..."
"No, I understand. Your sister explained everything."
"Maybe we can go some other time.
"Yes. Some other time."

Summer was sitting over family dinner complaining.

"I don't understand. First I thought he liked me, but now he's not even returning my texts."
"Boys, eh?" Mouse said with a full mouth. "You can't trust them. Hey, pass on the mustard!"

Dan's and Summer's search for romance shall continue...
142.title: The Melancholy of Dan Mitchels

144.content:
(Just a silly scene during "Serpent" that I could not place anywhere. :) )
---

- Oh, Doctor, I think I have an athlete's foot. - the woman said.
- Hmm. Yes, it's very bad. I'll have to prescribe a full fourteen minutes of tickling. Would you prefer to take it home or should I administer it right now?
- I think all things considered, I should probably take it here.
- Very well then. Please put your leg on this table and-

- Mouse Salt, which channel are you watching?- came Mom's voice from the living room downstairs. Mouse quickly rolled on her stomach and switched the TV off.
- Come down, there's a postcard from Summer waiting on the table!

(to be continued)
144.title: Mouse during story 5

15.content:
Click LEXICON for more detailed information about the setting.

Alternate universe:
Here's where you can go crazy (if you want). Turn everyone into a wizard, swap the genders of the protagonists, put the whole setting into space, change the genre or whatever you want.
15.title: Lexicon / Alt-universe stories

151.content:
(This section is to provide memory joggers and ideas for those who think they could use some.

You are NOT required to read or acknowledge any of the below information in order to create your own story.
If at any point you deviate from my interpretation THAT IS FINE and I'd love to see what the characters will turn into in your hands. :) )

CHARACTERS:

Summer Salt:
The main heroine of the story. She starts out as a 11-year-old (WordOfGod by Kuddles) but ages considerably between stories.
She could be described as uptight, hot-headed and frequently arrogant;
but a true hero always ready to fight for the needs of others.
Her perception of the world is colored by having consumed one too many detective stories, and she frequently imagines herself acting out such a story.

I actually find it curious that her strong moral sense remains unacknowledged and looked down on even by her sister and two best friends.

Despite her "bookworm" status, Summer is actually the most traditionally "girly" of all of the characters.

The Salt family all are derived from 60s era Western white "nuclear family" stereotypes. Hence, I want the reader to always picture Summer's dad with a friendly grin and a pipe in his mouth. :p
Summer herself is your typical white cheerleader stereotype, or more accurately draws on mid-20th teen detective story tropes. In later stories, characters often remark that for a "modern girl" she's remarkably traditional and old-fashioned. For example, she uses a typewriter and a camera instead of a cellhone - because that's what the archetype demands! :p

Susan "Mouse" Salt:
Despite bearing all the hallmarks of a spoiled youngest daughter, the 2nd daughter of the Salts displays a remarkably balanced personality. I think it's because (like many younger daughters) she subconsciously knows when not to push her luck. Thus, she knows how to enjoy life without worrying constantly like her sister.
At times I think she may actually be the wisest of all of the characters...
Age difference from sister appears to be significant (3-4 years?)
The origin of her nickname ("Mouse") has never been revealed in canon, leaving a good story ripe for future authors. :)

Jamie Ginger: Summer's best friend "A".
Jamie is decidedly more mature than his/her other friends, and has a tendency to abuse this fact.

Though they are yet to make an appearance, Jamie is actually either the oldest, or one of the oldest of a family with 8 kids.
I guess that makes him/her the "Ron Weasley" of the story, same as Chris is the "Neville".

Chris Clove: Summer's best friend "B". S/he tends to be an "underdog with hidden depths" type of character.

Chris appears to be an only child (at least so far, no other siblings have been mentioned). The only family mentioned yet are a mother and a grandmother.

Pao-Ting:
Summer's self-elected rival. A Chinese girl with a lot of ego who's also an inventor.

According to headcanon, she has an older sister who is an actress and foot model, and a great-uncle who is a offensive Chinese/Fu Manchu stereotype. She lived with her family until they lost their house and wealth between Mystery and Riddle.

Margaret (Montmorency) Allspice:
Class bully and heir to the Allspice farms. Margaret is your typical "sadist" type character.
Her partner in crime is (shorter, stouter) Abby.

Suzanne Salt: The girls' mother. Perfect mother, lover, and housewife. Ergo, there is not much to say about her.
(LOL, how cruel!)
Occasionally I wonder if a Ladies' Aid Society still exists in Hollering Heights. If not, I'm sure she can organize one.

Stephen Salt: A successful writer and the girls' father.

Dan Mitchels: Briefly mentioned in "Riddle..." (and further explored in the short story "Melancholy..."), Dan is Summer's crush (briefly) and a student at Hollering High & Elementary. He is the only character in the Summerverse who possesses zero interest in tickling, a fact that causes him considerable stress.

Characters who appeared in "The Sign of the Seven" (spoilers):

Waldorf Pepper:
A 19th-century pilot whose diary Summer finds behind a wall during the intro of "The Sign of the Seven".
A famous war veteran and soldier of fortune, who partook in many adventures alongside his cousin/sidekick Axelle ("Axle"). He owned the Salts' home before they bought it.

Miss Sugar/son:
Minor characters who appear in "Riddle..." as part of storyline.
(Never mentioned, but I think her first name might be Sandy.)

Patty Cinnamon:
Owner of the Cinnamon Bakery in HH. She wouldn't be of much interest if she didn't happen to be the secret-keeper of the Seven, the last remnant of a secret society among 7 families who have played a role in the founding of Hollering Heights. As such, she plays an important role in the conclusion of "The Sign of the Seven".
Her age and even gender are indeterminate. Basically a tinier, transgender Mary Poppins.

Clown Prince:
Simply put, a pervert.

He knows hypnosis, as well as many other clown tricks. He pops up at least 4 or 5 times (Riddle, Mystery, Clue, Case, and What...?) before the heroes can finally get rid of him for good.

Clown girls:
The Prince's entourage. In my canon, they come into existence in two ways:
1. the Prince may use hypnosis (his own clown trick) to mesmerize a girl momentarily. This is temporary and subjects have to be gathered on the spot; indeed the clown paint's original purpose (in "Riddle...") may have been to hide who the victims really are. 2. with a device created by Pao-Ting, the condition can be made permanent and for all known purposes irreversible (although building a reverse machine has never been attempted in canon). Some powers like a vampire's own hypnosis are known to be able to break the effect.

SETTING:

Hollering Heights: Summer's hometown where the majority of her adventures take place.
Based on "Riddle...", it appears to have many facilities, including: a museum, a library, a public park, a police station, a town hall, a shopping center...and probably many others that have not been revealed yet.

Notable locations include:

Featherton Manor: An ancient estate practically next door. It used to be haunted by Hildegard Featherton and Count Featherton.

The Allspice Farm: Owned by one of the town's oldest families, it has an important role in the town's economy, and also hosts the annual town fair.

General Podipopoulos: The founder of the town, if in name only. Based on his name, he must've been a pervert.

The Seven: Seven families who played a role in the founding of the town. Their names are: [SPOILER]Cinnamon, Pepper, Salt, Sugar, Clove, Ginger, and Allspice.[/SPOILER]
________
General guidance to writing Summer stories:
- One thing that stands out for me in SS stories is the amount of quality tickling content. ;) (And we know what you're all here for.) Even though I included a LOT more story focus in "Riddle..." (and have had immense fun building up the characters through them), most of these are actually there to provide a logical transition between different (fetish) scenarios. If you just want to cut the crap and stumble from one tickling scenario into another without providing exposition, go ahead. (This was more or less how it worked for "Mystery...".)
- Jamie's and Chris' genders are always up to the reader until a new chapter sets them in stone. Not using gendered pronouns is actually surprisingly easy once you get the hang of it. :p
151.title: Lexicon

info.brief_description: Tickle kink story and the 3rd Summer Salt interactive.
info.description:
The Clue at Cackle Creek:
Following the case of Featherton Manor, Summer's little sister and her two friends Chris & Jamie have disappeared.
Searching for them brings Summer to a sleepy port town where everybody is more than they seem.
Summer needs to rescue her friends, but only if she can first unravel the well-kept secret of of Cackle Creek.

Enjoy the stories of Summer's life in the biggest short tale collection yet.
